subject: The Friday Unwind: Your week in one smooth scroll
description_text:
Catch up on what’s happened this week — no stress, just the highlights.

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVs6Kb8NnX8bV1lSPh3xzNP9W8Ny6Rt5FBcL7N861KB45n4LbW7Y9pgv6lZ3lmW5Vy10d5WMmpKW8z-vR84HkV48W5cSgVc2x_Rv7W5KpVBQ6S-m0-W3Z-BH61c5gj7W7QYWtP1qYrhDVkf9T12QdvBTW6t0SjB8v5z5pW6jcjs71NNfcQW7wX2l98ry9HsW2Kg59x6Kr3rYW7V053G2hFLFDW8NdmJn3WRggcN6-5wy55rlD0W49GT3577QdVqW91WGtQ3V8cVZW2H7Tqc7JxgMNW5Z61Gz1zW6yYW6yTnk42wJfsyVfkgxR8TxM65W1CdJL81DqJP-W2VJ6zx8mW5rMVrjQs43_nj3kW5X-HrL8GXJJmN7Fknzbk52j_W7wNGSs30mF4GW4v9MPp43jBjLW9jy85k6HZm50VR3pXq55zLxrW1BMdlC2LfPkYN6M57dSGPcq9W6GnYw02MyrcxVHR5mL8nXp_WN2TxZBFT9bP9W1G_7Xv2h2LnMW1NBb9134K9WVVf0dfV8CDcbqW9kkfrK6fBbLJW94ythJ3Jc5PkW1MxdLz8W_qJ_W9lYY6v6JrVwnVj54vp8mvVtvd7Qtf604 )

Hey Atto,

It’s November already - and BFCM is almost knocking. Before you dive into another week of prep, here’s your low-effort look back at what’s new from Athos Commerce.

This week’s highlights include a brand-new Grow 25 ebook, a can’t-miss podcast on AI and brand experience, and expert webinars to sharpen your conversion game before peak season hits.

Catch you next Friday,

– The Athos Commerce Team

Featured This Week

? NEW Ebook | Grow 25: Volume 4 (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVs6Kb8NnX8bV1lSPh3xzNP9W8Ny6Rt5FBcL7N861KB43pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3nTW7jmpqn5R9N16V6tCv2998D0VW9dwlK_9kGhtKW8trdMY3brFtSW7VnNvf1V6mQCW8Vzm-V8HjtHfN69RZYRBJ7L2W4cdZBc5LyLlsW4qJMtQ8LxWbFVVplGl43npt8W2DyHsV3jhKf6W8mV_sJ70Jsf0W58k-CL42mfDcN29cCxprl4nxW6PftF61ZFvp7F6bYLfxqmnfW7MhBB-77vdHHW1cG7cy31GH17W2GRW3x5WCFTvW5DnDlS1J46yjW5prgQC26XMgcN7DGD33l5fbYW4jStJY3bh7-ZW2Mg1Gj3bkXPBN7-M1RLmnp4MW7XSR-m2GrdtJf2KpDm204 )

Technology is reshaping roles, redefining consumer expectations, and accelerating change faster than ever. Read insights from industry experts to understand the evolving relationship between humans, machines, and markets and what it means for the future of work and commerce.



Podcast | Kate Massey: Why AI Won’t Replace Human-led Brand Experience (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVs6Kb8NnX8bV1lSPh3xzNP9W8Ny6Rt5FBcL7N861KB43pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3nZN2ytLLTzkhjCW6kF4SG2pwHJMW6vF0rS3RQclyW7Y80ld7NqMBBW77hp6498RSnBW1ztQwb48M1YdN2B4CXGcw7JvN732yw5cr_K3W8gnY_g82Xf4HW33hXnC4ryX-cN2NFr9PrQBlpN91ftpljBDk_W7Hd23C6gzHJcW3k4Fr23N2qt0V4DH4616RrNkW47Rh1w2DJjPKN2lVQvVW38mjW4HMbpf7NKxbJW22r_cS79S1sjW72z3tx7myQT1W4bFqss8cQHyzVn_7KX5QSw4fW4_QWcT7xyK-1W3ghZ5n4g9sm1W20jpKB3C4wC9W1q95jG8qw2tcf3QHlkY04 )

Kate joins the Beyond The Fold podcast and reveals why brand experience will always outlast automation in achieving long-term success.

November 12 Webinar | From Discovery to Conversion: Play-by-Play Insights from Kick Game & Ecommerce Experts (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVs6Kb8NnX8bV1lSPh3xzNP9W8Ny6Rt5FBcL7N861KyC5n4LbW50kH_H6lZ3psMd-ckRdFDZ7W3QnkqZ6ngLnHW1FQTzj5JlJ1YN6bDC8K6cdsbW8Z4Nc117kM59W1Wkmcz8P43fjW2Qs9y64lBxcSVgXGkN6DFgqXVD6dCY3bhxtMW8tBF3V1HzPHYW6rmhVs5ykDL5N416SCvXmF_LW8tDBh889Sz3nN3SQpsWq7D4-W1GpS6y8fB2-nW5BkXzV8HVfWnW1z07lc4vNvdlW47PzQQ6pm-P6W2MXMGc3psKgNW6F1-W06gPJNtW5qZ_mf6_-2M5VPkRXk6m-BtXN7f3FtqBLJ6wN148g6kCnHqyVNhpHh28lM4BW4fw-4w1RKr0pW1BxN9r4cSv5zW1WqDMF4d88dxVQ7HXb4l41XDW3Dx6Zh5N05Y_W5lZ0bT8q2l5jW2SR3Zk7Hz6xzf45dn_l04 )

BFCM is around the corner - is your site ready? Join Kick Game - the go-to destination for trainers and streetwear - and a panel of ecommerce experts from Athos Commerce, Octane AI, and Blend Commerce as they share the insider moves you need to boost conversions this peak season.

On-demand Webinar | The Critical Countdown: Your Last-Minute BFCM Checklist (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVs6Kb8NnX8bV1lSPh3xzNP9W8Ny6Rt5FBcL7N861KB43pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3lrW7PhwLC8T1nfVW6GlJb-93drl8W1zSRCc2w0mxqW429Nfm2vRKCrW5RV9p88kJQkFW2H6jfx1H2vpHW21kh3J71NkR_MDZVKmj-85rW2mGXVf7ynlpCW6_RyF_5Lg_Z0W3XLGlp86j4qkW89-5Pp45Gm6yW4C2kr96dtjFGVTgXV34bQ5YmW84FX1-6znHZ3W77cskR36BkQPW1Kl23b7DhMydW7CfGZS8llgXCN4rF_1WnPKBKW3bHt2l7GPw5FVDBrWq45sZpGW7YYGwl1D16-9W8C9MsK6zkmwGW1vsJmF45hKNCVl94MM2WZmMpW7dTbrx7BmS1hf424vNY04 )

Evocative Media, Profit Peak, and Athos had a fast, tactical session covering the final checks that separate profitable, high-performing brands from everyone else.

Ebook | 2025 Ecommerce Tech Stack Playbook – Streamline, Scale, Grow Smarter (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVs6Kb8NnX8bV1lSPh3xzNP9W8Ny6Rt5FBcL7N861KyC5n4LbW50kH_H6lZ3lYW2WNj1l76cxVyW603ZHD6fm4M1W6gf_qZ6R4J5gW17dzPl4G7G58W5xJKFR3w6kDVW5Tf0cw9jy4lFN7T5RrhHfFwYN2kqcvgPdLLKW7fLLXc6BfbnrW20jw2d3XY7vJW4m2hJ57bkps7W1C0tWl1n5PKqW5GckG851TXmhW4m4F2V6dRvGzW7S50wB8vh4BcW2NXhbt5S9yMrVjgxPC5p7RHyW2tLH7z5ZxRyZW4kSJy_1NJM-zW7XjnCZ1JpvSGW4kpw1p8s0dd2W882Sd38jKz8NW26sf6d1Z1M-7W4T12W62s_lhtVkBc8d2V-r2tW7Wk5569c5ngMW3Tt06M6nqyFTW8_Z42d1B1vv8W8ZXlzF6gH97rW4cjX_D1hW-kHN2zT1n6pfjtqW4Vprxm8R556mf7bLCBg04 )

Discover the 2025 Tech Stack Playbook: strategies, trends, and partner insights to streamline tools, improve efficiency, and scale.

Blog | Top tips to aid product discovery in ecommerce (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVs6Kb8NnX8bV1lSPh3xzNP9W8Ny6Rt5FBcL7N861KBH3pyd0W95jsWP6lZ3kGW8h15R_6JvHRCW4N9ZGM7MLLfCW49xm-n4QsddKW7MWhYv13w5NTV5fqkd7JX63NW13D1FL7xq6zLN85Bx54ChrLFW5R4ss-4Btzs-N6FRN0X4J5LgW2Qpp1P7GDJFCW5n3gQ63CFDw7W2Td2d66X8HX1W3gkffJ4pg3thW1ttrTy7qsZW2W5wtwjz1W8lmVW2tTvsW4h8H_5W5bTQpM3mT4gqW2L_2ZB5ZbPZdW3_k6fg8CW2XpW8fxy5V7zt1fMW6tYYDF8tnhzDW17lQCF3s5PfqW4Lg9vJ8g06WDW8z1VW95Wl8jCW21ShYN37k9HVN210ZNTtjMtlW8wv2jS6H8zgyW291CPB4hzHhMW1Mbcb53d2fY8W3Xl12y1bTFKbf4Gd5_g04 )

IMRG explores how retailers can enhance product discovery, from optimising search and social channels to refining presentation, recommendations, and promotions - to capture intent and drive conversion.

Blog | Peak 2025: Tips to help retailers prepare (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVs6Kb8NnX8bV1lSPh3xzNP9W8Ny6Rt5FBcL7N861KBH3pyd0W95jsWP6lZ3kYW4KZ2CC7mWPKdW170rKd4gc7V6W2DWbst6QYjLjW8mmD4P88KlXSN8N8pXt7bt1GVF4nRC516NNXW4CVWHJ1gDq6jW7lvm9-7qdZjmN4ll_jz3NLDnN6Q41BKx5ZjKW3tl9X07QK4bRW3YMwTj8sL-Y2W8tLx_73ZQpcGW8-b3Dg3kgmV0W4WNkwC2CznhfW8KN3m799L5gPW6w2W5g7R4-K3W50XkXn7hNF-9W1YZ2Rp67PCD3W5sZqB82K0lKSW9l7Jqh1d9SqfW3Dl85b3ZMVm_W161FwD6g6DV2W8nksfS3zT561W5hjK-m1mlSnDW2FSf1j3pG2frN82Dp2BBNDCDW3VK0BB8bKh3rW3BRHn-4TK4JdW7ZXl2-5rZw6Jf6DTgZK04 )

Case Study | Minimani (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVs6Kb8NnX8bV1lSPh3xzNP9W8Ny6Rt5FBcL7N861KB43pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3mmV8Nz482sc8s_VnS79q1qCxRmW7n2yCm7RRy4wW35rprc30J4fQW7NdBw_6fVxTLW5qCfT46Z8814W4pClLF80JjFcN18H2M4CFFjSW6X3KTv3JmSpQW1nNSmQ2MMV6pN4zHNTHDdtSmW1BJ_2N43zJrLV5cjdk6f1DZ3W1_9WL47lnhx5W44jHDH29Zc9WVsWmMQ1yqRJSW4J19mQ4WKp_gN5VV2PWwHPM4W60CSwf60q7nQW273Zxh65MFMcW1rHcss1hrFB_W15G3cl64p8rRW80LhMH4jWZGmVPC7T-99BxlFW10z6C07Y7cpYV5LHyy8wGr3hf7bZ7Fj04 )
